title: Swarg Niwas Temple - One of the famous landmarks of Rishikesh
review: Swarg Niwas Temple is a famous tourist spot and multistorey temple in Rishikesh. It is a thirteen storeyed temple located on the bank of the river Ganga near Lakshman Jhula in Rishikesh. From the temple's top floor, one can enjoy marvelous views of the surrounding areas of Rishikesh.

title: Exellent place to stay
review: Swargashram is situated at a natural n beautiful place for meditation n pooja.Facilities here are available .

title: Great place with nice views
review: The place is located very close to laxman jhoola and has artis and poojas which are carried out at regular times. It has nice view of the Ganges.

title: Beautiful
review: Nice quite place, peaceful.

title: Powerful Gods
review: Sit and meditate and receive the powerful healing from this special place. Let the colors fill your eyes with Shiva energy and feel renewed

title: Very calm and peaceful environment
review: Temples are always good place for relaxing but i liked a lot the calm and peaceful environment of this temple. By just spending half an hour in this temple, felt fully relaxed and energetic.

title: Too good
review: Visiting swarg niwas temple is truly amazing experience.  it is just very close to laxman jhula.  we can sit and spend hours here.

title: peaceful with good views
review: this temple is near laxman jhula but not much crowed as laxman jhula. so it is very peaceful and view of rever awesome.

title: Very peaceful temple
review: Though it is a small temple but i usually prefer to go here as the temple is very peaceful and offers you calm environment to meditate.

title: Map location is wrong
review: It was amazing to know temple had been disappeared!!! :-)

title: peaceful
review: a small temple in rishikesh but it oozes peace and serenity all around. you can sit inside for hours introspecting or meditating.love this place.

title: good
review: One of its kind, a must go if you are visiting rishikesh and see the puja ceremonies especially in the morning

title: Multi story twinTemples
review: At the other side of Laxman jhoola, u vs find a Twin tower temple. It's very close to 13 story temple. Keep on climbing the stairs n watching gods n goddesses, coz at the top u vs find urself in heaven. From the top u can see the mountains around. A beautiful view.

title: nice temple
review: it has very clean with spiritual atmosphere and you could see many foreigners also.Good experience here

title: The towering temple
review: U can see this multi storey temple from the other side of the Ganges . As you walk across the Jula u can see the towering temple with all its splendour and majestic looks and architecture.

title: Twin temples
review: The first thing which you see in Laxman jhula area is this twin temple. It has become the symbol for rishikesh along with jhula

title: Breath-taking views of Ganges and Rishikesh
review: Swarg Niwas is a thirteen storeyed temple located on the left bank of Lakshman Jhula and each floor houses shrines of Hindu deities. The temple tapers into a narrow tower at the top. The top of the temple offers breath-taking views of Ganges and Rishikesh.

title: Amazing place to be alone
review: I had wonderful walk in this Temple. This multistory building is full of murti! You can meet every Hindu God and Goddess here and most of murti is man height! It's really splendid to look at their eyes and to find new and new murti in every little room. It's like spiritual adventure to Swarg! If not pay attention to sellers you can meet from time to time, it's absolutely wonderful! And when you reach the top of the Temple you can enjoy the view of Rishikesh almost from bird's-eye!

title: Peaceful place !!
review: The Swarg NIwas temple or Swarg Ashram is located very close to the Lakshman Jhula and is a very peaceful place to spend some time. The view of the Ganga river, the cool breeze and amazing skyline can be enjoyed from this temple.

title: Incredible twin towers of rishikesh
review: Situated at the banks of the ganga, multistory temple with a beautiful view. One of its kind, a must go if you are visiting rishikesh.

title: Its Swarg Ashram and not Swarg Niwas Temple
review: Have childhood memories of this place which I visited during char dham yatras with family. A nice experience to take walks near ganga.
